title: 422. Introducing "No Stupid Questions"
description: In this new addition to the Freakonomics Radio Network, co-hosts Stephen Dubner and Angela Duckworth discuss the relationship between age and happiness. Also: does all creativity come from pain? New episodes of "No Stupid Questions" are released every Sunday evening — please subscribe wherever you get your podcasts.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
